title: Countries with the most affected people from earthquakes 1900 to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The maximum Number of affected people (in millions) 70.9 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Haiti where Country is 3.4.
The highest value at Country China is 20.85x times more than the lowest value at Haiti.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The maximum Number of affected people (in millions) 70.9 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Haiti where Country is 3.4.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
Country China has the highest Number of affected people (in millions) and Haiti has the lowest Number of affected people (in millions).
Country Haiti has 20.85 times less Number of affected people (in millions) than Country China which is the highest.
The Country China has the highest Number of affected people (in millions), followed by India, and Chile. Down to the Country Haiti which is the lowest.
The highest value 70.9 at China is almost 4.89 times larger than the average value 14.51.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 145.12.
